nodes.excerpt: GPU.LAND offers GPU instances for Deep Learning — at dirt-cheap prices. How cheap? Up to 80% cheaper vs major cloud providers. We believe everyone, and not just "Big Tech", should be able to train AI models. So we built the cheapest place on the web to do it.
nodes.title: GPU.LAND - Affordable cloud GPUs for deep learning
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: GPU.LAND为深度学习提供GPU实例--价格很便宜。有多便宜？与主要的云供应商相比，便宜了80%。我们相信每个人，而不仅仅是 "大科技"，都应该能够训练AI模型。因此，我们建立了网络上最便宜的地方来做这件事。
localize.tagline: 用于深度学习的平价云GPU

localize.description: GPU.LAND爲深度學習提供GPU實例--價格很便宜。有多便宜？與主要的雲供應商相比，便宜了80%。我們相信每個人，而不僅僅是 "大科技"，都應該能夠訓練AI模型。因此，我們建立了網絡上最便宜的地方來做這件事。
localize.tagline: 用於深度學習的平價雲GPU

nodes.excerpt: Fishy Products by Adflow is the only GPT-3 copy generation tool that helps you prepare your April Fools' stunt. Our interface is a tribute to the original Mac OS from 1984 (inspired by poolside.fm). ⠀ The AI tool is completely free, no sign-up required!

nodes.excerpt: The world is filled with too much noise around China. Meho (“very good” in Shanghainese) is here to help you contextualize China and equip you with hands-on Chinese skills, so you won’t miss out on the opportunities brought by the development of China.
nodes.title: Meho - Understand and communicate with China like never before!
nodes.author: Charlie Liu

localize.description: 围绕着中国，世界充满了太多的噪音。美好（上海话 "很好"）在这里帮助你了解中国的背景，让你掌握实际的中文技能，从而不会错过中国发展带来的机遇。
localize.tagline: 了解并与中国进行前所未有的沟通!

localize.description: 圍繞着中國，世界充滿了太多的噪音。美好（上海話 "很好"）在這裏幫助你瞭解中國的背景，讓你掌握實際的中文技能，從而不會錯過中國發展帶來的機遇。
localize.tagline: 瞭解並與中國進行前所未有的溝通!

nodes.excerpt: Ennerate (YC W21) does business valuations for small and medium sized traditional businesses (plumbers, manufacturing, etc.) for 5x faster and 10x cheaper than existing services. Users upload financials, take a survey, and our models generate the valuation.
nodes.title: Ennerate - Automated business valuations for 'Main Street' companies
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Ennerate（YC W21）为中小型传统企业（水电工、制造业等）做商业估值，比现有服务快5倍，便宜10倍。用户上传财务资料，进行调查，我们的模型就会生成估值。
localize.tagline: 为 "大街 "公司进行自动商业评估。

localize.description: Ennerate（YC W21）爲中小型傳統企業（水電工、製造業等）做商業估值，比現有服務快5倍，便宜10倍。用戶上傳財務資料，進行調查，我們的模型就會生成估值。
localize.tagline: 爲 "大街 "公司進行自動商業評估。

nodes.excerpt: How would you like to solve all the mysteries of your data in just seconds? Simply pick an AI-based Template and voila -- instant discoveries in front of you. Combine different Templates to look at your data from unlimited angles!

localize.description: 你想不想在几秒钟内解开数据的所有奥秘？只需选择一个基于人工智能的模板，瞧--瞬间发现就在你面前。结合不同的模板，从无限的角度观察您的数据!
localize.tagline: 一键将您的数据转化为洞察力 🤯。

nodes.excerpt: Think of Speeko like a gym membership for your voice. Get instant feedback on your speaking style, and track your progress over time. Personalized activities help you build new skills in just 5 minutes a day. You'll be speaking with confidence in no time!

localize.description: 想想看，Speeko就像您的聲音的健身會員。您可以獲得關於您的口語風格的即時反饋，並隨着時間的推移追蹤您的進步。個性化的活動幫助您在每天5分鐘內培養新技能。您很快就會變得自信滿滿。

nodes.excerpt: Viable is a user experience analysis engine that aggregrates, sorts, and tags helpdesk, survey, and live chat customer feedback so you can ask questions about what your customers think, feel, and do -- and get human-like answers in seconds, powered by GPT-3.
nodes.title: Viable - Find immediate insights in surveys, helpdesk, and reviews
nodes.author: Todd Goldberg

localize.description: Viable是一个用户体验分析引擎，它可以对服务台、调查和即时聊天的客户反馈进行汇总、分类和标记，这样你就可以就客户的想法、感受和行为提出问题，并在几秒钟内得到类似于人类的答案，它由GPT-3提供技术支持。
localize.tagline: 在调查、帮助台和评论中找到即时的见解。

localize.description: Viable是一個用戶體驗分析引擎，它可以對服務檯、調查和即時聊天的客戶反饋進行彙總、分類和標記，這樣你就可以就客戶的想法、感受和行爲提出問題，並在幾秒鐘內得到類似於人類的答案，它由GPT-3提供技術支持。
localize.tagline: 在調查、幫助臺和評論中找到即時的見解。

nodes.excerpt: Sleegal is an online marketplace that uses machine learning to match users with lawyers. We built this website free for all to use because we believe high-quality professional service should be made accessible to everyone, not just the elite.

nodes.author: Gloria Qiao

localize.description: Sleegal是一个在线市场，它使用机器学习来匹配用户和律师。我们建立这个网站供所有人免费使用，因为我们认为高质量的专业服务应该让每个人都能获得，而不仅仅是精英阶层。
localize.tagline: 立即找到合适的律师--所有人都可以免费使用。

localize.description: Sleegal是一個在線市場，它使用機器學習來匹配用戶和律師。我們建立這個網站供所有人免費使用，因爲我們認爲高質量的專業服務應該讓每個人都能獲得，而不僅僅是精英階層。
localize.tagline: 立即找到合適的律師--所有人都可以免費使用。

nodes.excerpt: TextGen is a new service that allows you to train your own text generation ML models and then use them to generate text through a simple API with no AI knowledge required and at low price. You send us your text dataset, we train the model and serve it for you.
nodes.title: TextGen - Train and serve your ML text generation model using an API
nodes.author: Pablo Marino

localize.description: TextGen是一项新的服务，它允许你训练自己的文本生成ML模型，然后通过一个简单的API使用它们来生成文本，不需要任何AI知识，而且价格低廉。你向我们发送你的文本数据集，我们训练模型并为你服务。
localize.tagline: 使用 API 训练和服务您的 ML 文本生成模型。

localize.description: TextGen是一項新的服務，它允許你訓練自己的文本生成ML模型，然後通過一個簡單的API使用它們來生成文本，不需要任何AI知識，而且價格低廉。你向我們發送你的文本數據集，我們訓練模型併爲你服務。
localize.tagline: 使用 API 訓練和服務您的 ML 文本生成模型。

nodes.excerpt: Clockk is a FREE AI-powered time tracking tool for digital agencies and freelancers. See what you worked on, when, by project. No more time sheet pain! Perfect for software devs, graphic designers, digital marketers, and anyone else who bills time. 🔥💰🚀

nodes.excerpt: Looking to get genuine users on-board with minimum drop offs? Our offer includes identity verifications (KYC) for automating individual on-boarding and enhancing customer experience. We envision creating a trusted ecosystem where identity is the key to access.

nodes.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: 想让真正的用户以最少的流失率入职？我们提供的服务包括身份验证(KYC)，以实现个人入职的自动化，并提升客户体验。我们设想创建一个可信的生态系统，身份是访问的关键。
localize.tagline: 在印度实现KYC自动化和身份验证。

nodes.excerpt: MakeMyFund enables investors to build and invest in their own fully personalized efunds - without being experts in capital markets. The idea is to deliver 3%-5% higher returns than conventional mutual funds - most of this based on lower cost and tax savings.
nodes.title: MakeMyFund - Personalized virtual equity fund

localize.description: MakeMyFund使投资者能够建立并投资于自己的完全个性化的电子基金--无需成为资本市场的专家。其理念是提供比传统共同基金高3%-5%的回报率--其中大部分是基于较低的成本和节税。
localize.tagline: 个性化的虚拟股票基金

localize.description: MakeMyFund使投資者能夠建立並投資於自己的完全個性化的電子基金--無需成爲資本市場的專家。其理念是提供比傳統共同基金高3%-5%的回報率--其中大部分是基於較低的成本和節稅。

nodes.excerpt: Railz is the only Data as a Service platform that connects, normalizes and analyzes financial data from accounting service providers. We do this to make financing decisions faster, better and easier for Financial Institutions.

localize.tagline: 使用規範化會計數據構建金融中小企業應用

nodes.excerpt: Rejoy Health is a subscription service for the 20M people with Thyroid Disorder in the US. Rejoy Health members pay a monthly fee for treatment, symptom management & lifestyle coaching.
nodes.title: Rejoy Health - Digital clinic to treat and manage thyroid disorders
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: Rejoy Health 是一项针对美国 2000 万甲状腺疾病患者的订阅服务。Rejoy Health 的会员每月支付治疗、症状管理和生活方式指导的费用。
localize.tagline: 治疗和管理甲状腺疾病的数字诊所

localize.description: Rejoy Health 是一項針對美國 2000 萬甲狀腺疾病患者的訂閱服務。Rejoy Health 的會員每月支付治療、症狀管理和生活方式指導的費用。
localize.tagline: 治療和管理甲狀腺疾病的數字診所

nodes.excerpt: An email drop by Snazzy AI. In a single click, write emails to pitch investors or potential customers.
nodes.title: AI Emails by Snazzy - Pitch angels, VC’s or potential users with GPT-3
nodes.author: Chris Frantz

localize.description: 由时时彩人工计划群投的一封邮件。只需点击一下，就可以写邮件向投资者或潜在客户推销。
localize.tagline: 用GPT-3向天使、风险投资人或潜在用户进行推介

localize.description: 由時時彩人工計劃羣投的一封郵件。只需點擊一下，就可以寫郵件向投資者或潛在客戶推銷。
localize.tagline: 用GPT-3向天使、風險投資人或潛在用戶進行推介
